nchsdata 0.5
  • Reference

National Study of Long-Term Care Providers (NSLTCP) Residential Care Community (RCC) 2018 Public Use File (PUF)

Source: R/rcc2018.R
rcc2018.Rd

A data system of RCCs.

rcc2018

Format

An object of class survey.design2 (inherits from survey.design) with 503 rows and 155 columns.

Source

  • SAS data: https://ftp.cdc.gov/pub/Health_Statistics/NCHS/Datasets/NPALS/final2018rcc_puf.sas7bdat

  • Documentation: https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/npals/2018NSLTCP-RCC-PUF-ReadMeFile_provider.pdf

  • Codebook: https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/npals/final2018rcc_puf_codebook.pdf
